text:
Created attachment 23329
Add cleanup

apr_thread_cond_create() does not register a cleanup for the event created and causes a leak for each thread_cond object created.
Bug is in Windows latest 0.9.17 version (Unix 0.9.17 and Windows trunk are OK).

Ron
creator: ron@cti2.com

text:
This problem has been fixed in r551965 [1] and released in APR 1.3.0. So it probably makes sense to mark this issue as RESOLVED.

[1] http://svn.apache.org/r551965
creator: ivan@apache.org
